items.sentence: Please stop trying to be funny. Just be yourself.
Rumor has it that Tom and Mary are friends again.
Tom hasn\'t yet been told of his father\'s death.
I suspected that Tom might not have enough money.
I think I have some leftover pizza in the fridge.
Tom only listens to rock music from the eighties.
I bet that\'s not even Mary\'s real phone number.
What do you think the best way to lose weight is?
Tom has been living in Boston since he was a kid.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are playing volleyball.
Tom had no idea if Mary\'s allegations were true.
I could have sworn that I saw Tom downtown today.
I could hear Tom playing his guitar and yodeling.
Are you certain Tom wasn\'t the one who did that?
Are you sure we\'re going in the right direction?
I had to lend Tom money so he could pay his rent.
Would you like to know why Tom doesn\'t like you?
My father is paying back a huge loan on our home.
A man with a gun attempted to commandeer the bus.
Let\'s hear what you\'ve got to say for yourself.
